sqlMap.statement: SELECT C.AFT_DECL_PNT_DIGIT_NUM FROM CCY C WHERE C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND C.CCY_CD = #ccyCd# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT C.AFT_DECL_PNT_DIGIT_NUM FROM CCY C, GLBL_CMPY GC WHERE C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.CCY_CD = GC.STD_CCY_CD AND GC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND GC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
